completion: 99x is a technology company co-creating well-engineered, innovative digital products for the Scandinavian market.
99x (formerly 99X Technology / Eurocenter) was established as a joint venture between Markus Data AS, Norway and Informatics Private Limited, Sri Lanka in March 2000.

prompt: When was Eurocenter renamed to 99X Technology?
completion: Eurocenter was renamed to 99X Technology in 2012.
99X Technology was rebranded as 99x in September 2020.
